titles.title: To convey certain property at the Canandaigua Veterans Administration Medical Center in Canandaigua, New York, to the Canandaigua City School District.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.
Executive Comment Requested from Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary: 3/1/2001--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to convey to the Canandaigua City School District, New York, specified real property at the Canandaigua Veterans Administration Medical Center, subject to the condition that such property be used in perpetuity solely for educational and recreational purposes.
